issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Several links in the Appcelerator documentation are broken. I was looking at the Ti release notes eg https://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/?__utma=1.7073435.1351804921.1351804921.1351804921.1&__utmb=1.9.10.1351804921&__utmc=1&__utmx=-&__utmz=1.1351804921.1.1.utmcsr=my.appcelerator.com%7Cutmccn=#!/guide/Titanium_SDK_7.5.0.GA_Release_Note
fields.summary: Some Appcelerator documentation links are broken

comments.body: Hello, This looks to be server down issue that we are having. The docs links should be active soon. Check out couple of hours later. Thanks.

Hello, try logging through Axway documentation site: https://docs.axway.com/bundle/Titanium_SDK_allOS_en/page/titanium_sdk_release_notes.html
but, sign in to the platform first. 
Thanks.

Your help docs are still broken:
I just tried to navigate to "Deploying to Android devices" at this url: https://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Deploying_to_Android_Devices
And got a page broken content.
I must say your help docs/server has been consistently down or broken for many years. please do something about it.

As you will see from the screen grab I am logged in.

Also, after a change you made recently (within the last few months, not sure when exactly) your search became virtually unusable. So searching for Ti UX calls or parameters etc returns nothing.

 !Screen Shot 2019-04-22 at 12.14.19.png|thumbnail!
